positive_examples: This is an example of radioactive atom.
The radioactive atom demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed radioactive atom in this context.
A typical case of radioactive atom would involve these features.
The concept of radioactive atom applies here.
An atom with an unstable nucleus that undergoes radioactive decay by emitting particles or electromagnetic radiation.
negative_examples: This is an example of free atom, not radioactive atom.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: FreeAtom, or other types of Atom

definition: An atom with an unstable nucleus that undergoes spontaneous radioactive decay.
